name: Green Manalishi
description: Bright green from muddled mint and cilantro, this herbaceous punch from Lucky Robot in Austin, Texas combines Japanese and Texan flavors.
recipeIngredient: 6 ounces fresh lime juice from 10 to 12 limes
6 ounces fresh lemon juice from about 6 lemons

recipeInstructions.text: Muddle mint, cilantro, and serrano in a pitcher. Add the cucumber juice, lime juice, lemon juice, and agave nectar and stir to combine. Strain out the solids and refrigerate liquid until ready to serve, at least 1 and up to 4 hours.
To serve, combine the punch base with dry sake in an ice filled carafe or punch bowl. Serve in glasses filled with ice cubes.
